alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:41PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Brief Landspout Tornadoes Possible... At 140 PM MDT, conditions are becoming favorable for the development of landspout tornadoes generally north of Interstate 70 across Kit Carson County. However, at this time it is unknown which if any storm will produce a landspout. Any landspouts which develop are expected to pose a limited threat. Locations impacted include... Stratton, Flagler, Seibert and Vona. Landspout tornadoes can form with a developing thunderstorm before rain, hail, and even thunder is observed. Landspout tornadoes are not usually associated with a wall cloud and are often difficult to detect with weather radar. &&
